nodes.documentation:
This is a contract allowing users to mint eternal heroes from HorizonGames.
Price starts lower and increases

params._arcadeumCoinAddr: The address of the ERC-1155 Base Token
params._arcadeumCoinID: The ID of the ERC-1155 Base Token
params._factoryManagerAddr: The address of the Skyweaver Factory Manager contract
params._priceIncrement: Discount you get when you move up a discount step
params._tierSize: How many asset need to be purchased to move to next discount tier

params._ids: Array of card IDs to make non-purchasable

getPurchasableStatus(uint256[]).return: The purchasable status of card IDs provided

getSuppliesCurrentTier(uint256[]).return: Supply left in current tier for each ID and tier number

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.details: `_data` must be encoded as follow: abi.encode(Order)

params._from: The address which previously owned the Token

registerIDs(uint256[]).details: This contract assumes that there is a supply cap, which     if present, will enable total_supply tracking. To prevent     errors, a maxSupply must be set before an ID can be registered.

params._ids: Array of asset IDs to allow for purchasing

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: This function MUST return true if it implements the ERC1155TokenReceiver interface and ERC-165 interface.     This function MUST NOT consume more than 5,000 gas.

params.interfaceID: The ERC-165 interface ID that is queried for support.s

supportsInterface(bytes4).return: Wheter ERC-165 or ERC1155TokenReceiver interfaces are supported.

params._recipient: Address where the currency will be sent to

methods.constructor: Create factory, link factory manager and store initial paramters

deregisterIDs(uint256[]).notice: Will indicate that asset ids in _ids are NOT purchasable

getArcadeumCoinID().notice: Returns the token ID of Arcadeum Coin

getFactoryManager().notice: Returns the address of the factory manager contract

getOwner().notice: Returns the address of the owner.

getPriceIncrement().notice: Returns how much the price increase every tier increment

getPriceTiers(uint256[]).notice: Returns the current price tiers of tokens in _ids

getPrices(uint256[]).notice: Returns the current price of tokens in _ids

getPurchasableStatus(uint256[]).notice: Get the purchasable status of card IDs provided

getSuppliesCurrentTier(uint256[]).notice: Returns how many tokens left are in each tiers for given _ids

getTierSize().notice: Returns amount of token per price tier

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.notice: Handle which method is being called on transfer

registerIDs(uint256[]).notice: Will indicate that asset ids in _ids are purchasable

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Indicates whether a contract implements the `ERC1155TokenReceiver` functions and so can accept ERC1155 token types.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers the ownership of the contract to new address

withdraw(address).notice: Send current ARC balance of sale contract to owner of the contract
